articles.title: Daylight Saving Time Begins Sunday. When to Set Your Clock Forward, How to Prepare and More - NBC Chicago
articles.description: Most Americans, including Illinois residents, will shift their clocks ahead by an hour this weekend, signaling warmer temperatures and brighter days ahead.
articles.content:
Most Americans, including Illinois residents, will shift their clocks ahead by an hour this weekend, signaling warmer temperatures and brighter days ahead.

articles.title: ‘Flamin’ Hot’ Review: Eva Longoria’s Feature Directorial Debut Is a Charming Cheetos Flavor Origin Story - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Longoria directs a film about Richard Montañez, the Mexican American janitor who claims to have invented Flamin' Hot Cheetos.

articles.title: Joe Biden Appoints 2 Indian-American CEOs To US Advisory Committee - NDTV
articles.description: US President Joe Biden on Friday (local time) named two Indian-Americans -- Revathi Advaithi, CEO of Flex, and Manish Bapna, CEO of the Natural Resources Defence Council to the Advisory Committee for Trade Policy and Negotiations.

Joe Biden announced a team of who will be a part of the US Advisory Committee. (File)
